text: We are now on the last page. The speech is shaking in Bercow’s hands. He is getting worked up.
author: MattChorley

text: There are a lot of unhappy/incredulous faces on the government frontbench. Julian Smith doing a lot of lip pursing. Amber Rudd raiding eyebrows. Ben Wallace looking a little disbelieving.
author: MattChorley

text: Bercow is going in hard on the idea that the government can’t keep bringing back the same question. Now giving us a long rundown of events so far. He has a LOT of speech still left to read
author: MattChorley

text: Perhaps fearing he’s not been in this Brexit story enough, Bercow is to make a statement at 3.30pm. Could be on the procedural niceties of the government bringing the same amendment back again and again

text: Good question. The Peoples Vote campaign have spent months demanding MPs get to vote on a second ref. So this week they did, and the Peoples Vote campaign urged MPs to abstain because “Now was not the right time”

text:
I’ll tell you who I can’t stand in politics: everyone.

From the People’s Vote people and people who used to be in the army, to everyone on Twitter, I hate them all. And I hate myself

Me in @thetimes 
https://www.thetimes.co.uk/edition/comment/let-me-tell-you-which-people-in-politics-i-can-t-stand-everyone-cwvvxczmk …
author: MattChorley
